title: What went wrong for Lewis Hamilton?
summary: On paper Lewis Hamilton’s move to Scuderia Ferrari appeared to be a case of perfect timing; it wouldn’t be long, so we thought, before he’d be challenging for race wins.…

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Lewis Hamilton move to from Mercedes?
What was the expectation regarding Hamilton's performance after joining Ferrari?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He would be challenging for race wins.
wrong_options: He would focus on team development.
He would struggle to score points.

qa_pairs.question: Before joining Ferrari, which team was Lewis Hamilton associated with?
